Stage

Stage

A Stage instance is the root of your movie. There should never be a need to instantiate a new Stage from within a movie.

new Stage

Constructs the movie root, i.e. the global stage.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
messageChannel Object

The messageChannel object used to communicate with the renderer

Mixes In

  • EventEmitter
  • Timeline

Methods

destroy

Destroys the stage

Returns:

The instance

Type
this

freeze

Freeze/destroy the loop

loadSubMovie

Loads a sub movie and runs it in the context of a new Movie object (should be provided by RunnerContext bootstrap)

Parameters:
Name Type Description
movieUrl

URL of sub-movie (will use the dirname of the submovie as asset path)
callback Function

A callback to be called when your movie has loaded. The callback will be called with it's first argument signifying an error. So, if the first argument is null you can assume the movie was loaded successfully.

post

Sends data to the client.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
data
Returns:

The instance

Type
this

sendMessage

Sends a message to the renderer / stage controller

Parameters:
Name Type Description
messageData
Returns:

The instance

Type
this

setBackgroundColor

Set the background color of the stage

setFramerate

Set the framerate of the movie

Parameters:
Name Type Description
framerate Number

frames per second

setOptions

Sets options on the stage

Parameters:
Name Type Description
options Object
Properties
Name Type Argument Default Description
framerate number <optional>
 30

Playback speed of the movie
baseUrl string <optional>
 '.'

The base URL to use to resolve urls.
pluginUrl string <optional>
 '.'

The base URL to use to resolve plugin location.
plugins Array <optional>

A list of plugin names to load.
Returns:

the stage intance.

Type
this

setRendering

Set the technique for rendering, currently only supporting value, 'crispEdges'.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
renderingType String

'crispEdges'

unfreeze

Unfreeze/initiate the loop
